title: Leave Club Error
body: **You're the owner of CLUB, so if you want to leave you'll have to designate a successor first.** plz help me how to solve this problem.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you still have someone else in the club with you. They'll have to leave before you can delete the club (if that's what you're trying to do) or you'll have to designate them as the new owner if you just wish to leave the club. You can do this by right clicking on their name inside your club chat.

Let me know if you have any questions.
